attributes.action: Save the future of Third Avenue Heath Surgery from it's potential closure.
attributes.additional_details: Following a report from the Care & Quality Commission, Third Avenue Health Surgery is under the threat of closure. The potential closure of the surgery would be of the grave detriment of over 7,000 registered patients. Canvey Island has a population of over 40,000 people and already has a poor infrastructure the closure of Third Avenue Health Surgery will only lead to further problems with Canvey's other doctors surgeries already oversubscribed it would not be in the public interest for the closure to take place.
attributes.background: Following a report from the Care & Quality Commission, Third Avenue Health Surgery is under the threat of closure. The potential closure of the surgery would be of the grave detriment of over 7,000 registered patients.

rejection.details: This is the responsibility of the Care Quality Commission, which is an independent regulator, not the Government or Parliament.
